abstract: Kenneth D. Lewis, the bank’s chief executive, is under fire for the controversial acquisition of Merrill Lynch, but his job may be saved by proxies wielded by brokers.
snippet: Kenneth D. Lewis, the bank’s chief executive, is under fire for the controversial acquisition of Merrill Lynch, but his job may be saved by proxies wielded by brokers.
lead_paragraph: Can Kenneth D. Lewis hold on at Bank of America?

headline.main: Bank of America Chief in Battle to Hold His Job
headline.print_headline: Bank of America Chief in Battle to Hold His Job

abstract: Can Kenneth D. Lewis hold on at Bank of America?
lead_paragraph: Can Kenneth D. Lewis hold on at Bank of America?

headline.main: Bank of America Chief in Battle to Hold His Job

abstract: Calpers, the nation’s largest pension fund, announced Tuesday that it would vote against the re-election of all 18 directors of Bank of America, including its chairman and chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis, at the bank’s annual meeting on Wednesday.
snippet: Calpers, the nation’s largest pension fund, announced Tuesday that it would vote against the re-election of all 18 directors of Bank of America, including its chairman and chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis, at the bank’s annual meeting on Wednesda...
lead_paragraph: Calpers, as the California Public Employees’ Retirement System is known, announced on Tuesday that it would vote against the re-election of all 18 directors of Bank of America, including its chairman and chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis, at the bank’s annual meeting on Wednesday.

headline.main: Calpers Is Voting Against Lewis and BofA Board

abstract: The California pension fund says the directors, including the chief executive, Ken Lewis, failed in their duty to shareholders.
snippet: The California pension fund says the directors, including the chief executive, Ken Lewis, failed in their duty to shareholders.
lead_paragraph: The California Public Employees’ Retirement System has announced that it will vote against the re-election of all 18 directors of Bank of America, including its chairman and chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis, at the bank’s annual meeting on Wednesday.

headline.main: Calpers to Oppose Re-election of Bank of America Board
headline.print_headline: Calpers to Oppose Re-election of Bank of America Board
